critique: The document is an executive order regarding the declassification of information related to the 9/11 terrorist attacks. It emphasizes transparency and public interest in disclosure while acknowledging the need to protect national security. The order mandates declassification reviews by various agencies and sets standards for declassification, prioritizing public disclosure unless it poses a significant risk to national security. It also includes provisions for reporting to the President and congressional intelligence committees and for public release of declassified information.
